mapper.sql: crseq, cusseq, userid, crcontent, crregid, TO_CHAR(cusRegDt,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') crregdt, crregid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cus_reply ( crseq, cusseq, userid, crcontent, crregid, crregdt ) VALUES ( COMMENTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cusSeq}, #{userId}, #{crContent}, #{crregId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM cus_reply ORDER BY crseq

SELECT X.*,Y.* FROM( SELECT T.cusseq AS cusseq, T.crseq, T.userid, T.crcontent, TO_CHAR(T.crregdt,'YYYY-MM-DD') crregdt, T.rnum AS no FROM( SELECT cusr.* ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY crregdt desc ) AS rnum FROM cus_reply cusr WHERE cusSeq = #{cusSeq} )T WHERE rnum BETWEEN (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+1) AND (#{page_size} * (#{page_num}-1)+#{page_size}) )X NATURAL JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cnt FROM cus_reply cusr WHERE cusSeq = #{cusSeq} )Y
